entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is supposed to go into the prefect carriage with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who is supposed to go into the prefect carriage with Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is aware of Ron and Hermione's plans to go into the prefect carriage.

entities.name: head boy
entities.description: The Head Boy is mentioned as someone who will give instructions to Ron, Hermione, and Harry.

entities.name: girl
entities.description: The Girl (Head Girl) is mentioned as someone who will give instructions to Ron, Hermione, and Harry.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is mentioned as a caged bird that Ron and Hermione are dragging off toward the engine end of the train.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are supposed to go into the prefect carriage together, as mentioned in the text: 'We're — well — Ron and I are su pposed to go into the prefect carriage'.
Ron is dragging his trunks, Crookshanks, and Pigwidgeon off toward the engine end of the train, away from Harry.
Hermione is also dragging her trunks and Pigwidgeon off toward the engine end of the train, away from Harry.
